title: Universal Instructional Design (UID) Project for Inclusive Educational Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Evening/weekend courses for office/administrative professionals, utilizing smartphone-based collaborative learning tools and examining inclusive design cases considering social identities (gender identity, sexual orientation)

learning_goals: Learners can design educational scenarios reflecting diverse social identities by applying the 7 principles of UID (Universal Instructional Design)
Through project-based collaborative activities, learners can develop educational assessment rubrics that incorporate the concept of intersectionality
Learners can produce inclusive educational materials using smartphone-based collaboration tools (Google Docs, Padlet, etc.) in resource-constrained technical environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
